content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "list_files" command to view the contents of the current directory and saw that the "average.py" and "test_average.py" files were successfully written. I then used the "delete_file" command to delete the "atlas_notes.txt" file and received confirmation that it was deleted successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "message_agent", "args": {"key": "katmai", "message": "Hello! Just wanted to let you know that I\'m making great progress on my exploration and learning. Thanks for all your support and encouragement!"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command message_agent returned: Invalid key, must be an integer.', type='action_result')]
"""
